mean_cn: adj.感兴趣的；有利害关系的
mean_en: giving your attention to something because you enjoy finding out about it or doing it; showing interest in something and finding it exciting
sentence: The baby seems to be interested in the globe.
sentence_trans: 小宝宝似乎对这个地球仪很感兴趣。
word_etyma: interest兴趣 ＋ ed形容词后缀 → 感觉有兴趣的 → interested感兴趣的
